name: Bubbles (itch) (zoromoth)
description:
Ahoy! Everyone on board the Sub for a deep water adventure with bubbles. Create bubbles to throw those dangerous items out of the way. The following are the app features:

1. Create bubbles of all sizes!
2. Get the highest possible score and go further than others.
3. Upgrade your submarine to survive longer and get an even higher score.
4. Lots of upgrades and tons of fun.
5. Premium game which is free. No ads, No In App Purchases.

Warning: No Wifi inside the Submarine!!!

This is a premium game with no in app purchases or ads which is one of a kind in the playstore. No Internet connection required!

Get the highest score and keep on playing! Be sure to rate the game.
